nodes.text: Kitpth was a Jawa male who lived in Anchorhead on Tatooine during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He sold various items, such as stimulants, and medpacs. Other items Kitpth had for sale included a vaccine against the Rakghoul plague, the Czerka Corporation's VX-736 injector, a vaccine against Womp Rat fever, and a piece of machinery referred to as a "reconfigured disassembler core".
Kitpth first appears in BioWare's 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
